transcript:
Checkweigher Solutions
Inline weighing for compliance with legal requirements and reduction of waste for the food, beverage, pharma, chemical and non-food industries.
Metal Detection Solutions
Industrial metal detection systems for a wide range of conveyorized, pipeline, gravity and vertical food processing and pharmaceutical applications.
X-ray Inspection Solutions
X-ray inspection equipment for contamination detection minimizes product recalls by enhancing food safety and providing quality assurance.
Vision Inspection Solutions
Vision inspection for automated quality control of product labeling and packaging in industries such as food, cosmetics, and pharmaceutical production.
Combination Systems
Combination inspection systems combine precise weighing with metal detection, x-ray inspection, or vision inspection for enhanced product quality and safety.
ProdX - Quality and Food Safety Process Management Software
ProdX™ is a complete quality inspection data management system that delivers full digital control of your product inspection equipment for real-time monitoring and food safety compliance.
METTLER TOLEDO Product Inspection recognizes the challenges faced by various industries in manufacturing. We offer a wide range of product inspection solutions to address these challenges.
Dairy
Inspection technologies to enhance the quality and safety of dairy products such as yogurt, butter, sour cream, milk, cheese, and whey.
Meat, Poultry, and Seafood
Advanced inspection systems help producers of meat, poultry, and seafood meet safety and quality standards.
Confectionery and Snack Foods
Inline inspection solutions support snack and confectionery manufacturers to maintain consistent quality, safety, and product excellence.
Ready Meals | Ready-to-Eat Foods
Quality and safety inspection solutions help producers of convenience foods uphold strict quality standards and meet regulatory requirements.
Bakery
Comprehensive bakery product inspection systems that enhance quality control processes throughout bakery production.
Pharmaceutical and Nutraceutical
Advanced pharmaceutical inspection solutions for physical contamination detection, fill level and weight control, label and package verification, and other quality inspection checks.
Chemical
Quality inspection tools assist chemical manufacturers with contamination detection, fill level checks, completeness checks, package integrity assessments, and label verification.
Cosmetics
Inspection solutions help cosmetics and personal care producers detect physical contamination, verify fill levels, inspect product labels, and maintain tamper-evident seals.
METTLER TOLEDO Product Inspection systems are designed to meet your individual quality control requirements. Click on the application below to learn more about our inspection solutions.
Physical Contamination Detection
Metal detection and x-ray inspection systems detect physical contaminants during manufacturing and play a crucial role in protecting consumer health. Learn more about physical contamination and how to prevent it.
Fill Level Inspection and Control
Checkweighers, x-ray systems, or vision inspection systems are used to monitor fill levels and help manufacturers avoid overfilled or underfilled products.
Label Inspection Applications
Vision inspection systems use smart cameras and intelligent software to identify labeling errors or missing information, reducing the chance of label-related recalls.
Completeness Checks
Automated systems verify that packages contain the correct components and quantities, supporting product consistency and customer satisfaction.
Product Integrity Inspection
Inspection systems evaluate the condition and completeness of products using measurement methods that vary depending on product characteristics, manufacturing processes, quality standards, and types of inspection.
Content and Package Quality Inspection
Inspection systems on production lines, along with final packaging controls and quality assurance procedures, work together to maintain consistent product quality.
Weight and Mass Control
Precise measurement technologies monitor product amounts during production, helping manufacturers comply with regulations and meet customer expectations.
System Integration and OEM
Advanced product inspection systems support our partners in meeting customer requirements, enhancing their reputation and expertise in delivering effective solutions.
Product Inspection Equipment for Quality Checks in Manufacturing
Product inspection solutions from METTLER TOLEDO help verify the quality and integrity of your products—inside and out. As a global company, we leverage extensive industry experience gained through genuine partnership with our customers worldwide. We are committed to supporting the needs of our customers throughout the entire life cycle of their equipment, from commissioning and installation to regular maintenance and servicing.
With our in-depth understanding of the challenges manufacturers face, we have developed an extensive product portfolio of advanced quality inspection systems to meet the diverse requirements of our customers. Our range of product inspection equipment includes sophisticated metal detection systems, highly accurate dynamic checkweighers, cutting-edge x-ray inspection technology, and state-of-the-art machine vision systems. These systems can be used as standalone solutions or integrated into your production equipment. We also offer several combination inspection systems that combine weight control with foreign material contamination detection and label inspection.
For the next level in product safety, we offer ProdX, a complete inspection data management and connectivity software solution. ProdX delivers full digital management of your product inspection equipment, enabling real-time monitoring and compliance with food safety standards. It is designed to enhance data collection and future-proof your product inspection systems in line with Industry 4.0 initiatives. Our exceptional global service options complete our portfolio.
Every inspection system we offer is designed to:
Help keep consumers safe and protect your brand’s reputation
Increase productivity and profitability
Maintain product quality in compliance with industry legislation and codes of practice
Support your business and help you maintain a competitive edge
Product Inspection Technology Overview
Checkweighing Solutions
Our inline checkweighers provide 100% weight and completeness checks for enhanced quality control, improved productivity, and increased profitability. We offer a comprehensive line of dynamic checkweighers suitable for food, pharmaceutical, chemical and other industries. For challenging production environments, our hygienic checkweigher range is rated IP69 and can withstand strict cleaning procedures and most caustic detergents. A wide variety of spacing, handling and sorting options accommodate nearly any package design. Our FlashCell EMFR load cell technology delivers precise weighing results, even at high speeds of up to 800 packages per minute. This automated weighing technology helps deliver accurate product amounts, reduced product waste and optimized production processes.
Industrial Metal Detectors
Inspect food, pharmaceutical and other product types for metal contaminants, including unpackaged and packaged products on conveyors, bulk free-falling powders or granules, vertical form fill and seal applications, and pumped liquids, pastes, and slurries in pipes. When inspecting food, metal detection systems help protect consumers from potentially harmful metal contaminants, while also helping manufacturers comply with food safety inspection standards and protect their brand. Our pharmaceutical metal detectors are self-contained inspection systems designed to check all tablets, capsules, and pharmaceutical powders for metal contaminants. In addition to protecting consumers, these systems are important for quality control and promoting compliance with regulatory requirements.
X-ray Inspection Equipment
X-ray inspection systems provide quality assurance in manufacturing by detecting physical contamination and performing quality checks in one automated inspection system. Food and pharmaceutical manufacturers worldwide rely on industrial x-ray inspection systems to help protect the welfare of their consumers and the reputation of their brand, reduce the risk of costly product recalls, and support regulatory compliance.
Our x-ray inspection systems deliver product quality control at every stage of the production process for raw materials, bulk-flow, pumped, and packaged products. The presence of foil or metallized film packaging does not affect the sensitivity of contaminant detection by the x-ray system.
Vision Inspection Systems
Machine vision technology is used to check product label quality across all market segments and packaging types. Our vision inspection solutions are also capable of performing additional integrity and quality checks on product packaging. They accurately inspect screw or snap-on caps and lids and check the accuracy and quality of labels and packaging on plastic containers, glass bottles, jars, flat packages, cartons, and pill packs. These automated optical inspection systems operate at high speeds, allowing you to maintain production throughput levels without compromising label and package quality.
Combination Inspection Systems
For manufacturing facilities with limited floor space, we provide combination systems that integrate multiple inspection technologies at a single control point on your production line. You can mix and match product inspection technologies according to your specific needs to create one cost-effective system.
We offer the following combinations:
Checkweighers with metal detection
Checkweighers with x-ray inspection
Checkweighers with machine vision
A three-in-one inspection system combining a checkweigher, metal detector, and vision inspection system
All these options provide a space-saving product inspection solution that optimizes the use of available space on your production line.
ProdX: Next Level Food Safety and Quality Management
Take your food production to the next level with ProdX, our productivity software designed for real-time monitoring of our product inspection equipment. ProdX streamlines quality control processes, boosts production efficiency, and simplifies line operations like never before.
Connect seamlessly to METTLER TOLEDO Product Inspection equipment and gain instant access to critical runtime data from anywhere, empowering you with the ability to monitor operations remotely. With ProdX, every performance monitoring test result is automatically logged and stored, making audits effortless and helping you maintain compliance with industry standards.
Fully Integrated Product Inspection Solutions Tailored to Your Requirements
We offer both standalone and fully integrated product inspection equipment to meet your specific quality inspection needs. METTLER TOLEDO Product Inspection provides a comprehensive range of quality inspection systems supported by a global service network. We work closely with other equipment manufacturers to design production equipment with integrated inspection capabilities. Our teams have also designed combination inspection systems that help establish true critical control points using multiple quality inspection technologies on the production line.

Remote Support Options
Keep Production Running
In addition to our existing 24/7 technical phone support, we offer the latest in remote service support using Augmented Reality (AR) technology. This allows us to provide the quick expert support you need to achieve your productivity goals.
Our METTLER TOLEDO augmented reality-powered visual remote assistance solution helps us to fully understand your service issues. Using a mobile device with an integrated camera enables us to see exactly what you see. We can guide you step-by-step to resolve the issue by providing real-time contextual assistance, such as adding text, drawings, or highlighting objects with 3D markers. Benefit from the fastest fault diagnostics, repair, and part replacement support by using the latest technology. We can also remotely connect to some of our products for additional service enhancement. Please contact your local service team for more details.
